library('DEoptimR')


Schwefel_221= function(x)
  {
  Num=length(x)
	maximum = 0.0
	for (i in 1:Num)
	  {
    if(abs(x[i]) > maximum){ maximum = abs(x[i]) }
		}
	fun=maximum
  return(fun)
  }
# f(x)=0 , x=(0,0,...,0) [-100,100]

dim=10
RUNS=50
ITE=2000
Y=0;X=0
for(i in 1:RUNS)
  {
  JDE_R=JDEoptim(rep(-100, dim), rep(100, dim), Schwefel_221 ,
         tol = 1e-20,NP=100, trace = FALSE,  maxiter =ITE)
  Y[i]=JDE_R$value
  }
MEAN=mean(Y)
STD=sd(Y)
MAX=max(Y)
MIN=min(Y)
cat('Schwefel_221 JDE DIM=',dim,'RUNS=',RUNS,'ITE=',ITE,'\n')
cat('MEAN=',MEAN,'\n')
cat('MAX',MAX,'\n')
cat('MIN=',MIN,'\n')
cat('STD',STD,'\n')
